mapper.select: select sum(payMov_price) from joa_payMovie where payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)
select to_char(sysdate,'yy') from dual
select to_char(sysdate,'mm') from dual
select sum(prs_pro_price*prs_pro_count) from joa_product_result where prs_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)
select count(*) from joa_payMovie where payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_gender) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_gender='ë‚¨' and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_gender) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_age) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_age >= 10 and mem_age < 20 and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_age) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_age >= 20 and mem_age < 30 and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_age) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_age >= 30 and mem_age < 40 and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_age) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_age >= 40 and mem_age < 50 and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)

select count(mem_age) from joa_member,joa_paymovie where joa_member.mem_id=joa_payMovie.payMov_mem_id and mem_age >= 50 and payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)
select max(paymov_mov_title) from joa_paymovie where payMov_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)
select max(prs_pro_name) from joa_product_result where prs_date between (select trunc(sysdate,'mm') from dual) and (select last_day(sysdate) from dual)
select * from joa_admin order by admin_idx desc

select nvl(sum(paymov_price),0) from (select admin_shop,paymov_price from joa_admin paymov_the_branch left outer join joa_paymovie on admin_shop=paymov_the_branch) where admin_shop=#{admin_shop} group by admin_shop
select * from joa_product_result

select nvl(sum(prs_pro_price*prs_pro_count),0) from (select prs_pro_name,prs_pro_price*prs_pro_count from joa_product_result prs_pro_name left outer join joa_product_result on prs_pro_name=pro_name) where pro_name=#{pro_name} group by pro_name
select * from joa_movie

select nvl(sum(paymov_price),0) from (select mov_title,paymov_price from joa_movie paymov_mov_title left outer join joa_paymovie on mov_title=paymov_mov_title) where mov_title=#{mov_title} group by mov_title
select * from joa_paymovie where paymov_the_branch=#{paymov_the_branch}
select * from joa_paymovie where paymov_mov_title=#{paymov_mov_title}
select * from joa_product_result where prs_pro_name=#{paypro_pro}

select nvl(count(paymov_price),0) from (select mov_title,paymov_price from joa_movie paymov_mov_title left outer join joa_paymovie on mov_title=paymov_mov_title) where mov_title=#{mov_title} group by mov_title
select count(*) from joa_paymovie where paymov_the_branch=#{paymov_the_branch}
select count(*) from joa_paymovie where paymov_mov_title=#{paymov_mov_title}
select count(*) from joa_product_result where prs_pro_name=#{prs_pro_name}
select count(*) from joa_paymovie where paymov_mov_title=#{paymov_mov_title}
